original_title: Starr Gate to Fleetwood: Open Top Blackpool Tram Ride
overview: The entire 60 minute, 11.5 mile tram journey from Starr Gate to Fleetwood, filmed from the top deck of open top Streamliner 706 'Princess Alice' on a fine sunny day.  This non-stop journey passes all the points of interest along the prom in Blackpool and through to Fleetwood.  See numerous other trams pass by as we work our way north.
title: Starr Gate to Fleetwood: Open Top Blackpool Tram Ride
